content:
When I participate in these photo sessions,
my body emanates a milky white glow,
looking back, it's like the world's gentle gaze upon its visitors.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content: Long ago, a master observed a mantis molting at dusk, and from this observation, he developed the "Mantis Style" martial art.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Since I often eat during twilight hours,
I wonder if I'll theoretically master the "Dinner-Fu" someday?
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
"'The sunset's beauty knows no bounds' has a following line.
But you know what? Manna thinks that sometimes,
it's enough to just remember 'the sunset's beauty knows no bounds.'"
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊
闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
If morning is when all things awaken,
then dusk, could it be...
"When the gods of darkness awaken"?
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
When dusk arrives,
I love to put on my favorite outfit,
For a grand World-Bubble Tour!
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
If dawn marks the awakening of all things,
Then dusk, I suppose, could be called...
"The awakening of the night deities," perhaps?
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
I love bringing out all my precious treasures, big and small, when the sunbeams are at their brightest.
Now that the sunbeams have retired for the day, it's time for my treasures to return home as well.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊
闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
The sunset's rays are far gentler than those at noon,
Just as people in their twilight years are more mellow than in their youth.
You see, the chromatic harmony of humanity and nature is truly one and the same.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊
闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Ah, twilight has fallen! The park visitors,
they seem to cherish this hour, posing beneath the setting sun,
as though it were some ritual of dusk.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
I prefer using yellow as a gentle base tone for coordination,
But I would never describe it as the yellow of twilight,
Nor tell others that I'm "wearing twilight"...
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
There's a saying among mystic scholars,
that the twilight hours are especially conducive to bursts of inspiration.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
When the sun sets, everything is blanketed in a warm, gilded light.
This time of day is known as "the moment of dark powers."
You can almost sense some kind of mysterious presence...
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content: When the sun sets, everything is blanketed in a warm, gilded light. This time of day is known as "the moment of dark powers." You can almost sense some kind of mysterious presence...

content:
(yawns) At the twilight hour,
Time for my seventh meal of the day~
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Oh, at dusk as usual,
I just woke up,
Having my "breakfast".
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊
